correction_response: This tweet is potentially misleading. There's no credible source or evidence provided to support the claim about FBI Director Christopher Wray. It's important to verify such serious allegations from reliable sources before sharing.
note_1_text: While an increase in the presence of prostitution at Davos has been reported, there has been no evidence put forth of FBI Director Christopher Wray engaging in such activity.    It should also be noted that prostitution is legal in Switzerland.  https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-11659769/How-pointing-ceiling-bar-Davos-takes-order-sex.html  https://nypost.com/2023/01/18/prostitutes-charge-davos-attendees-2500-a-night/
note_2_text: To make a serious claim like this there needs to be a source
